main_definition: LCD stands for Liquid Crystal Display, a type of flat panel display technology used in various electronic devices.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A type of screen used in televisions and computer monitors
meanings_and_examples.example: The new television model has an ultra-high resolution LCD screen.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An abbreviation for Liquid Crystal Display, which is a technology for flat panel displays.
meanings_and_examples.example: LCDs are commonly used in smartphones and tablets due to their slim design.
